overview: Dreams. Hot, sensual. Lately Katia has been restless with erotic dreams. The plumber, the painter and his two beautiful models. Everywhere, Katia finds herself in another steamy encounter.  Calmed by her lover Sylvia's caresses, she decides to seek the help of a famous sexologist who gives his all to relieve his tormented patients.  Katia finds the unorthodox cure, and unexpected pleasures.
title: Katia's Dreams
